text: @realDonaldTrump Trump has absolutely nothing to run his re-election on, so at his Coronavirus Pea Tree Dish Rally, he did nothing but regurgitate his Divisive Campaign Of 2016! The problem is, he’s been President the last 4 years! Quoting Janet Jackson! “What Have You Done For Me Lately”?
